sourcesContent:
import { MdDeleteForever } from 'react-icons/md'
import { StyleSheet, SafeAreaView, View, Text } from 'react-native'


const Card = ({ id, title, amount, month, year, handleDeleteNote }) => {
	return (
		<SafeAreaView style={styles.note}>
			<View style={styles.centerText}>
				<Text style={{ color: "#000" }}>{title}</Text>
			</View>
			<View style={styles.center}>
				<View style={styles.keyFrame}>
					<View style={styles.key}>
					<Text style={styles.keyElement}>{amount}</Text>
					</View>
					</View>
					<View style={styles.noteFooter}>
					<Text>{month}</Text>
					<Text>{year}</Text>
					<View style={{ flexDirection: "row", cursor: "pointer" }} onClick={() => handleDeleteNote(id)}>
					<Text style={styles.delete}>Видалити</Text>
					<MdDeleteForever color='#9e5cf6'
						className='delete-icon'
						size='2.6em'
					/>
					</View>
				</View>
			</View>
		</SafeAreaView>
	)
}

const styles = StyleSheet.create({
	note: {
		border: 'solid',
		color: '#9e5cf6',
		borderRadius: 25,
		padding: '1rem',
		minHeight: 260,
		display: 'flex',
		flexDirection: 'column',
		justifyContent: 'space-between',
		whiteSpace: 'pre-wrap',
		width: '80%',
		marginLeft: '10%',
		marginBottom: '0.1%',
		fontSize: 18,
	},
	noteFooter: {
		color: '#666',
		display: 'flex',
		flexDirection: 'row',
		alignItems: 'center',
		justifyContent: 'space-between',
	},
	centerText: {
		width: '94%',
		height: '0.5%',
		marginLeft: '3%',
		marginTop: '3%',
	},
	center: {
		width: '94%',
		height: '25%',
		marginLeft: '3%',
		marginTop: '20%',
		marginBottom: '1%',
	},
	keyFrame: {
		backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6',
		color: '#fff',
		marginRight: '91%',
		marginLeft: '-3.7%',
		display: 'flex',
		flexDirection: 'row',
	},
	keyElement: {
		backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6',
		color: '#fff',
		borderRadius: 50,
		fontSize: 20,
		fontWeight: 600,
		marginLeft: -18,
		marginRight: 20,
	},
	key: {
		backgroundColor: '#9e5cf6',
		color: '#fff',
		marginRight: '40%',
		marginLeft: '42%',
	},
	delete: {
		marginRight: '4%',
		fontSize: '22px',
		marginTop: '4%',
		fontWeight: '500',
		color: '#9e5cf6',
	}
});

export default Card
